English: Full Blood Moon... Was it today?
Tee hee,
I feel like doing something extraordinary tonight!
(A few moments later)
Lei... Ah, no, Lewisia. What's this about...?
Hm hm. Just call me Lei, Gau. No matter what, I am Lei, too.
O-okay. Then, I'll call you L-Lei like I used to do.
Fine.
An invitation, Lewisia? What's this about? And we have a young Barbarian friend here.
You sending an invitation. Now I have seen everything.
Phillop, Pavel. Glad to see you.
(Dwarf King and Wizard of Ice Dragon...)
Am I the last to arrive, Lewisia?
Welcome, Lorraine.
(Sage of the Forest...)
It's been a long time, Lewisia.
It occurred to me on my way here that your birthday is around this time of year.
Lei's Birthday...!
Yes. Today is the day that I can see the Blood Moon.
I guess living among humans for so long is bringing out the human side of me.
I suddenly felt the urge to receive well wishes for my birthday like other humans.
It's funny that you wanted to experience a human tradition,
but there is only one human here, this young one, among the people you invited. Hahaha!
*Chuckle* Gau means something special to me.
When I was staying at the orphanage for a while, I saw Gau take good care of the kids on their birthdays.
I.. It's an honor for me, just to be with the heroes who saved the world.
Hahaha... What a pure soul you are. I can sense the blessing of the Ice Elementals from you.
Uh... Umm...
He is just a young boy who has a long way to go.
Why don't we start the celebration now?
Oh, right.
On behalf of the Elves and spirits of the Forest, congratulations to the ruler of pure red.
*Sigh* Lorraine, please keep the formal tone for formal events.
You're making the mood all awkward.
Oh, I didn't mean it...
Then, I'll keep it casual. Happy birthday, Lewisia. This is for you.
It's a collection of dewdrops that contains the energy of young elementals. It will help with your Mana recovery.
Hahaha. Lorraine thought the same thing that I did.
I thought a Mana Stone with pure Mana energy would be a good present for Lewisia, so I brought one.
Congrats, Lewisia. Take this.
Congratulations. This is a snow crystal filled with Mana of Ice Dragons.
I don't think I'll need to explain its value.
Ah... Umm... I couldn't prepare a gift, but happy birthday, Lei.
They knew me and when my birthday was because they're old friends.
I did not invite you expecting a gift. There's no need for you to worry about it.
I just wanted to celebrate like you humans do.
But...
I'll remember your birthday and make sure to bring a nice gift for you on your next birthday!
*Chuckle* Sounds fair. Thank you for your kind words.
Now, let's get started with the birthday party. Enjoy the night, and help yourself!
Mirianne!
Mirianne!
Umm... Where did she go?
(Bump!)
Mirianne?
Oops. Oh, Sonia!
Why are you in such a rush?
Ah, Grandpa. Did you see Mirianne?
Mirianne?
Umm... I have no idea.
Hmm... Okay. Thanks, Grandpa!
This isn't the type of thing I should to use my power for, but...
... (Buzz)
...Found it. The electric reaction from Mirianne's magical dagger...
It's this way.
Umm? What is this bottle?
*Cough, cough* What's this powder?
I think I know what this might be... Eh, Mirianne must be pulling a prank on me.
Let's go again...
Urgh...! (Buzz)
What is this powder? It's interrupting the signal detection!
Detection won't work, at least for a little while...
Umm? A note?
She's lured!
Hahaha! It was worth the effort, collecting powder from Yanadis!
Now that she can't use detection, I wonder how she'll find me!
Mirianne... Playing hide-and-seek, all of a sudden? What are you thinking?
Well, whatever.
You hide, I'll seek.
I can't use detection, so I should use another way.
Found you, Mirianne!
...Ehhh? This quickly? How did you...?
Have you forgotten?
I have this ring on me!
Aww, that's cheating!
There is no such thing as cheating in hide-and-seek.
I caught you, Mirianne. So I win, right?
...Haha.
Nope! I won!
Sonia! Happy birthday!
Sonia, sweetheart, happy birthday! / Happy birthday, Sonia!
You were always out traveling around this time of year, so the kids didn't get to celebrate for your birthday.
They wanted to give you a big celebration this year.
Mirianne did a good job distracting you while we were preparing.
Good work, Mirianne!
*Giggle* Thank you, Grandpa!
Playing hide and seek with her was a lot of fun.
...Thank you.
Hmmm... A good day as usual.
Now, I wonder... What is this note that was stuck on the door?
Hey, Mr. Dakaris, since we have nothing special going on today, why don’t you take a well-earned rest in the headquarters?
We're gonna go and see if we can find you a nice present!
Hohoho...
A present? That sounds too grand.
But then again... It feels rather pleasing to have my birthday be celebrated by someone.
Now now, I should relax and have some rest until they return...
Hmmm...
Something feels lacking here.
Ahahaha... You think... so?
It looks enough to me...
Oh no, I’m not talking about the food.
Um, you know... It’s sincerity we are lacking... We should prepare a more sincere gift.
You can eat a delicious meal anytime.
Besides, Mr. Dakaris himself already enjoys exploring the streets for delicacies.
Remember when he went on a cuisine hunt last time?
Mmm, you're right.
Oh wait! How about a book?
He's always reading books. I’m pretty sure he’ll be overjoyed if we get him an interesting book.
Hmm... We should then search for books he probably wouldn't have read yet.
Alrighty, we can leave the food here. They are all ready to serve.
Let's go find that book!!
Heyyy, wait for me!
Hmmm... Good... Very good.
This bookshop has a unique... atmosphere...
I’m sure we’ll find something interesting here.
Hello!
Is anyone here?
Hmm... Something's odd.
I don't think there’s anyone here...
But looking around should be fine... Right?
This place is creeping me out, but... Okay, I guess?
Let’s... try looking around...
Look, I managed to find some books.
There’s this book and this book...
Nice. I also found some books that seem challenging and mysterious.
I wonder where we can pay for these books.
Ahhhh!!! What the?!
Aieeee?
Payment... Please...
Ahahaha....
Well, this is embarrassing...
I-indeed.
The shopkeeper was really nice.
But that was so sudden....
and I thought I was facing an Undead of some sort at first...
...Hahaha, I know right?! Glad I wasn’t the only one who was thinking that way.
Phew...
That shopkeeper... He even made us a bed out of books in case we faint,
and also gave us a discount...
Ahahaha...
Let’s keep this secret between us...
...Of course.
Ahahaha...
Happy birthday, Mr. Dakaris!!
Ohhhh, what a feast you've prepared.
You have my utmost gratitude.
Here! It's your birthday gift!
To be honest, we don't know what this book is,
but we found it in that bookstore two blocks down.
Ah, I know that place.
The owner of that store is a great man...
Although he is quite shy, always wearing that thick hood.
Ahahaha...
Hmm? Did something happen?
N-no, it’s nothing! Hahahaha...
Please! Dig in!
The food will get cold...
Ah, yes.
Once again, you have my thanks for preparing such a feast.
But what fun is a feast without friends? Let us all enjoy this grand meal together.
Kara!
Guess what day today is!
*Beep* 5th February.
Examining existing data. Checking for updates.
Today is the day for backing up Hanus' combat data as well as
updating my combat data. And...
Correct!
Hehe. Thank goodness Hanus is in Orvel.
Not a lot of people use firearms here in Orvel,
so it's hard to find data appropriate for you, Kara.
Yes. Ever since Hanus has cooperated with us,
the percentage of victory has increased to 20.14%, while the percentage of frame damage has gone down to 0.4%.
So today...
So once we get the data, you'll have Orvel conquered in no time!
No, Master. Today is...
Great! Let's go, Kara!
This is going to get us a ton of research funds for this month! Yipee!
Whaaaaat?!
No way! Hanus isn't here?!
But I've made appointments for every 5th!
Haha... But I don't think today is going to work.
Hanus' father just contacted us.
She told him how she really wanted to go back to the field for her birthday this year,
but she was totally shot down.
What? Oh no...
Huh? Wait!! Today is Hanus' birthday?!
I've tried to tell you numerous times, Master.
But you entered into a state of excitement at the thought of updating and did not listen.
It looked like Hanus was getting some things ready as well. It's too bad.
I'm sorry, but could you stop by again some other day?
Mmm... I guess there isn't anything we can do...
...Wait, wait!
So you're saying you don't know where Hanus is right now, right?
Yes. But she did say she'd be back before it was too late.
Okay! Thanks, Veronica!!
Come on, Kara!
Master. This is the way to the research lab.
Yeap!
It's Hanus' birthday! We can't just sit by and let it pass.
Let's make a weapon for Hanus! Yeah?
But based on the combat data we have backed up on her,
the weapons she uses require detailed adjustment and inspection.
There are about 13 hours left until midnight.
I'm not certain we could manage to finish before then.
No, no. We can do it!
Because... Hehehe...
You're here, Kara!
*Sigh* I'm sick of being treated like a child.
I was treated with respect back there!
Unlike father, they acknowledged my abilities...
I had people who liked me... who liked my performances...
*Beep* Confirming location. Moving now.
There you are! Hanus!!
Huh? This voice...
(Oh!! I was supposed to meet Annette today!)
Uh, Annette. What brings you here today?
You, of course!
We collected records of the routes and locations you frequently go,
and successfully located you before midnight.
Hmm. Now, now...
Let's start, Kara!
(Start what?!)
Target confirmed.
Wh-what are you—
Happy birthday!!
Happy birthday, Hanus.
Huh...?
...This is...
Hehe. It's your new weapon!
We made it using your records left on Kara.
98.7% match to backed-up combat data.
According to my calculations, the weapon is ready for immediate use.
...But I... I forgot about our appointment...
Oh, that's okay! Stuff like that happens!
You help us all the time! Don't sweat about missing one day!
Percentage of victory increased since backing up of Hanus' combat data.
Level of progress in Master's research increased. Percentage of frame damage reduced.
Your skills are effective in breaking records.
Tha...Thank you. Happy birthday.
Ehem. A true soldier should, of course, be capable of what I do.
...Very well. Since my return has been postponed,
I will continue to help you with your research, Annette.
Yay! Thanks, Hanus!
(...How could I forget? There are people who like me here as well...)
(...I won't lie. I still want to go back to the army...)
(But with them, I want to... stay here a little longer...)
(Thanks, Annette! Thanks, Kara!)
What's wrong, Zafir? Something bothering you?
I don't know if you could say I was bothered, but...
I'm just not sure if it's really okay that we don't do... anything.
Oh, you mean the God King's birthday.
Yes. I know he said he wanted to let it pass quietly, but still...
Hmm... Yes, it really is a tough call to make.
Does it mean that we do a less fancy job celebrating it or do something really small?
Or does it mean that we shouldn't do anything altogether, other than wishing him happy birthday?
You could ask me next year, and I still wouldn't have an answer.
Haha. So you've been thinking about it, too.
What should we do?
Should we ask Laias about it?
It is an important issue, but are you sure it's okay to ask Laias these kinds of things?
Well, we could talk about this all day, but we're never going to come to an answer.
...That's true...
Welcome, Laudia! Is that you, Zafir? It's been a while.
Yes, it's been a while.
We wanted to ask you something.
Now what would that be?
Well...
Hmm. I see how that could be confusing.
I think the last option would be the closest to what His Majesty actually meant.
The kind where he can be left alone in peace.
Is that so...
But would that really be okay?
He's going to say that it's okay— that it's exactly what he wants...
But I doubt you two would like to let him spend the day like that.
Is that how you feel, too?
I think it should be okay as long as we don't do anything too fancy.
We could get by with some birthday greetings and a small gift.
Right. Then we'll do just that. Thank you, Laias.
Now, what could we possibly present as a small gift to a man who's had everything in the world...?
How's this?
Your Majesty.
This isn't much, but...
...I can't help but remember.
After sending me gifts every year even from studying abroad,
you came back with a handful of things.
No. It does not do to dwell on the past.
What is going on out there?
W-we're sorry to disturb you, Your Majesty.
We heard you wished to be left in peace...
But found it too great of a pity to let it pass so quietly and decided to come for a visit.
Have we gone too far?
...It's fine. Come in.
What was the commotion just now?
Uh, that was...
Hoabis... Didn't I tell you not to...
We had something prepared for you the way people celebrate birthdays nowadays,
but Hoabis got a little interested and kept standing in front of Zafir's foot...
Hmm? What is it?
Your Majesty, we wish you a very happy birthday. This isn't much, but...
Hmm. I've never seen such a dish in the desert.
Apparently far off in Orvel or the Empire,
they celebrate birthdays by eating this dish called 'cake.'
We thought it would be good to have you try it since it's not something that can be found around here.
I see... Did you make this?
Not exactly. I had Laudia and Zafir help me.
You could say all three of us made it together.
...This is indeed small and simple.
But I do thank you. Now I wish to be left alone to rest.
Yes, Your Majesty. Happy birthday.
Your Majesty, I hope you have a very happy birthday.
Time goes by and keeps making way for new things.
As much as the past is not something that can be forgotten, it is also foolish to get tied down by it.
This may seem small, but it's enough to turn my head facing forward.
